properties.Name: CustomerGender
properties.Description:
The gender associated with the Customer.
The gender that an individual associates with can change over a period of time and is represented with 'period start date/period end date' qualifications, which represented the best case for knowing this information.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: GenderId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Gender.

Columns.Name: CustomerGenderNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer's gender.
